---
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_document: default
---
```{r}
left=read.csv('Y:/data/vHL.csv')
right=read.csv('Y:/data/vHR.csv')
hist(c(left$vHL,right$vHR))
hist(log(c(left$vHL,right$vHR)))
### get mag values for plotting
quantile(log(c(left$vHL,right$vHR)),seq(0,.1,.02))
### save magvec values for plotting
write.csv(log(left$vHL),'Y:/data/vHLlog.csv')
write.csv(log(right$vHR),'Y:/data/vHRlog.csv')
```
